Sub-Objective: Unit cost per square meter of road/building works among the municipalities (15 Marks).

Objective: To assess the level of implementation of the works against the agreed contract approved work programs and outputs (Efficiency) Max points – 35
Sub-Objective: To assess the progress of the works against time (10 Marks)
Parameters: Physical progress lag – (difference between the planned as derived from initial work program and actual physical progress) (5 Marks)
Physical progress lag – (difference between the planned as derived from the current approved revised work program and actual physical progress) (5 Marks)

Sub-Objective: To assess the existence and effectiveness of internal controls for certification and payment of executed works (18 Marks)
Parameters: Presence of detailed measurement sheets (2 Marks)
Payment above certified amounts (IPCs, fee notes, material supply invoices etc.) (3 Marks)
Criteria: No payment above certified amount – 3mks; Any payment above certified amount -0mks

Parameters: % of overpayment (as a result of variance between audit values and certified works) to the certified value of the works (10 Marks)
Timeliness in payment of IPCs, fee notes, material supply invoices etc. (3 Marks)
